author: marcinds
content: Today I will repeat the experiment with sending ~80k 1-blob txs from 80k accounts, but this time I will spam in parallel from 8 machines instead of 1, so the whole spamming should be a done a few times faster and network utilization should be higher a few times. I'm finishing preparations, pulling a trigger in a few minutes
